net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.base.state

Class SearchIndexerSourceStateBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.base.state.SearchIndexerSourceStateBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchIndexerSourceState

    public class SearchIndexerSourceStateBean
extends Object
implements SearchIndexerSourceState
    This is the implementation of SearchIndexerSourceState as JAXB-ready Java-Bean.

    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

        Returns:

      • setIndexingDate

        public void setIndexingDate(Date indexingDate)
        This method sets the indexing-date. It should be called after the source has been completely updated in the search-index.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • getLocationState

        public SearchIndexerDataLocationState getLocationState(String location)
        This method gets the state for the given location.
        For each configured data-location a SearchIndexerDataLocationState will be available.
        Specified by:
        getLocationState in interface SearchIndexerSourceState
        Parameters:
        location - is the location of the data-location for which the state is requested.
        Returns:
        the SearchIndexerDataLocationState of the given location or null if no such state exists.

      • getOrCreateLocationState

        public SearchIndexerDataLocationState getOrCreateLocationState(String location)
        Parameters:
        location - is the location for which the state is requested.
        Returns:
        the requested SearchIndexerDataLocationState. If it does not exist, it is created and associated.
        See Also:
        getLocationState(String)
